text_block_list.text:
It's the start of a new year, and Winning Ticket, Biwa Hayahide, and 
Narita Taishin are visiting the shrine to make their first prayer of the 
year.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Whoooa! Look at all these people! New Year's around here is like the 
Derby!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Just look, it's super crowded, right? Same as the Derby!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: You make everything about the Derby.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Soon she'll be telling us how a washing machine is like the Derby.
Anyway, all three of you did really well last year.
Anyway, all three of you did really well last year.

After Winning Ticket's first win, she clinched another two for a 
three-win streak. Her rivals racked up some nice results too.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I wish I could've gotten Top Junior though…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I was hoping I could too.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: No way, you'd start bawling at the awards ceremony.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Wait, could that be why I didn't get picked?!
You're all almost at the Classics. You should be proud.
You're all almost at the Classics. You should be proud.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! First the Satsuki Sho, then the Japanese Derby, and the Kikuka Sho! But especially the derby!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
It's an honor to win any of them… And I want that honor more than 
anything.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeeeah, let's pray on it! I wish to win the Yayoi Sho and move right 
on to the Classics!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh, and, and! I wanna race together with Taishin and Hayahide! The 
end!

The friendly rivals work hard together toward the goal they've had 
since they first became classmates—to run in the same race.
And that race is approaching faster than they could've imagined.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Extra, extra!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Read all about it! Not only is Tickezo racing in the Yayoi Sho, Taishin 
will now too!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Taishin too?! Waaah! Our time to race together's finally cooome!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Eheheh. You shouldn't be all too pleased. Everyone's been talking 
about how good Taishin's looking.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! All the more reason I need to step it up!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Trainer! I wanna shorten the time I need to go from zero to top 
speed.

Nice. You're thinking more concretely. That means you've been using 
your head when you train.

Nice. You're thinking more concretely. That means you've been using 
your head when you train.

The rivalry she has with Biwa Hayahide and Narita Taishin is pushing 
Ticket to enhance her game.

Surely Ticket is pushing her rivals too. We'll need to be in top shape 
for this race—not just for Ticket's sake, but for Taishin's as well.
choice_data_list: Get ready to give it all you've got!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Right! Bring it on!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
We're here today at the Yayoi Sho! The racers are now making their 
way onto the track!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hey! We're all walking the runners' tunnel together, Taishin!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Quit yelling, the echo's crazy down here.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Hehe, you two never change.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: 'Cause we're rivals! And rivals are friends for life!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Quit it with that!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
It does feel special to be running with you, but this doesn't change 
anything for me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I'm still gonna go all out to win this.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I feel the same way! Running with each other isn't the goal—I've gotta 
win!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I'll be watching you two out there. Make me proud to be your rival.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: You got it!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Right, here I go.

The Yayoi Sho—the first showdown between friends—begins amid 
resounding fanfare.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Which runner has what it takes to win the Yayoi Sho?! They're in the 
starting gate…

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: And they're off!
